segments.text: I notice the boy standing on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems determined to get those cookies, no matter what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool is unstable, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know their mom is right there, oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should tell them to be careful, but I don't want to spoil their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balance is impressive, but I'm scared he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water on the floor getting closer to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't slip and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their teamwork, even if it's a bit risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they'll be fine, but I'll keep an eye on them just in case.
segments.speaker: PAR
